flickrimporter-connected:
Message displayed in Special:Preferences when the user's account is connected to Flickr.

* $1 is their Flickr username.
flickrimporter-not-connected: Message displayed in Special:Preferences when the user's account is not connected to Flickr.
flickrimporter-connect: Link text for the link that initiates the OAuth connection process.
flickrimporter-disconnect: Link text for the link that disconnects the OAuth connection to Flickr.
flickrimporter-error-no-auth-url:
Error message displayed when the Flickr authentication URL could not be determined.

* $1 is the error message.
flickrimporter-imports-link:
Label in Special:Preferences directing users to their JSON user page on which they can configure this extension.

* $1 is the link to the page.
flickrimporter-template-name: The name of the template that photos' wiki pages will be populated with.
flickrimporter-upload-comment:
Upload comment that will be used for imported photos.

* $1 is the Flickr URL of the imported photo.
flickrimporter-flickrid-link:
Text label that appears for the FLICKRID magic word.

* $1 is the Flickr ID (an integer, and a link).
